Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell has garnered increasingly attention due to its high conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode

Sentencas: However, when a liquid metal is used as the anode, the electrolyte is subjected to hot corrosion by the liquid metal and its oxide.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode

Sentencas: In the present study, both chemical and electrochemical corrosions of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte by liquid Sb and Sb2O3 are conducted at 750 degrees C for up to 100 h to simulate the situations occurring in the direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode

Sentencas: The tested specimens are characterized by a scanning electron microscope and an electron probe micro-analyzer.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode

Sentencas: In the case of chemical corrosion, both liquid Sb and Sb2O3 penetrates into grain boundaries of the electrolyte, resulting spallation of grains from the bulk.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode

Sentencas: The depth of liquid Sb penetration is deeper than that of liquid Sb2O3.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode

Sentencas: Electrochemical corrosion of the electrolyte by liquid Sb occurs in the same way as the chemical corrosion at an increased rate promoted by applied current.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode

Sentencas: It is also found that the electrochemical corrosion of the electrolyte by liquid Sb improves the cell performance with the sacrifice of electrolyte.
Titulo: Hot corrosion of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells with it a liquid antimony anode
